pt: :[name=???]:Hello Maker, and welcome to the PokémonSDK Technical Demo!
de: \c[18]With your mouse, click on this message to skip it.\c[0]

pt: :[name=SirMalo]:I am SirMalo,[WAIT 40] and here are my workmates Aerun,[WAIT 100] Nuri Yuri,[WAIT 100] Palbolsky,[WAIT 100] Rey,[WAIT 100] and Walven![WAIT 100]
de:

I see, I’ll let you handle the rest on your own.\c[0]

en: :[name=SirMalo]:Of course, PokémonSDK would never have reached this level without all the contributors who played their part!
es: :[name=SirMalo]:Of course, PokémonSDK would never have reached this level without all the contributors who played their part!
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:Of course, PokémonSDK would never have reached this level without all the contributors who played their part!
de: :[name=SirMalo]:Of course, PokémonSDK would never have reached this level without all the contributors who played their part!

en: :[name=SirMalo]:As far as this demo is concerned, it will let you test the different systems we offer with PokémonSDK ingame.
es: :[name=SirMalo]:As far as this demo is concerned, it will let you test the different systems we offer with PokémonSDK ingame.
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:As far as this demo is concerned, it will let you test the different systems we offer with PokémonSDK ingame.
de: :[name=SirMalo]:As far as this demo is concerned, it will let you test the different systems we offer with PokémonSDK ingame.

en: :[name=SirMalo]:But it is also connected with Pokémon Studio, and it will let you see how these features are implemented.
es: :[name=SirMalo]:But it is also connected with Pokémon Studio, and it will let you see how these features are implemented.
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:But it is also connected with Pokémon Studio, and it will let you see how these features are implemented.
de: :[name=SirMalo]:But it is also connected with Pokémon Studio, and it will let you see how these features are implemented.

fr: :[name=SirMalo]:Tu arriveras sous peu sur l'Île, une collection de maps sur lesquelles tu pourras te balader et expérimenter.
en: :[name=SirMalo]:You will soon arrive on the Island, a collection of maps on which you will be able to explore and experiment on.
es: :[name=SirMalo]:You will soon arrive on the Island, a collection of maps on which you will be able to explore and experiment on.
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:You will soon arrive on the Island, a collection of maps on which you will be able to explore and experiment on.
de: :[name=SirMalo]:You will soon arrive on the Island, a collection of maps on which you will be able to explore and experiment on.

fr: :[name=SirMalo]:Je te conseille de d'abord te rendre à la Tour, ça sera le début de ton parcours dans cette démo.\nlQuelqu'un t'y attend.
en: :[name=SirMalo]:You'll want to start by going to the Tower, as it will be the beginning of your journey. Someone will wait for you there.
es: :[name=SirMalo]:You'll want to start by going to the Tower, as it will be the beginning of your journey. Someone will wait for you there.
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:You'll want to start by going to the Tower, as it will be the beginning of your journey. Someone will wait for you there.
de: :[name=SirMalo]:You'll want to start by going to the Tower, as it will be the beginning of your journey. Someone will wait for you there.

fr: :[name=SirMalo]:Mais avant de te laisser partir, je vais te demander quelques informations.
en: :[name=SirMalo]:But before you leave, I have to ask you for some information.
es: :[name=SirMalo]:But before you leave, I have to ask you for some information.
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:But before you leave, I have to ask you for some information.
de: :[name=SirMalo]:But before you leave, I have to ask you for some information.

en: :[name=SirMalo]:Do you know how to change your controls?
es: :[name=SirMalo]:Do you know how to change your controls?
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:Do you know how to change your controls?
de: :[name=SirMalo]:Do you know how to change your controls?

en: :[name=SirMalo]:Great! Then let's continue with the next question.
es: :[name=SirMalo]:Great! Then let's continue with the next question.
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:Great! Then let's continue with the next question.
de: :[name=SirMalo]:Great! Then let's continue with the next question.

fr: :[name=SirMalo]:Pour changer tes touches, appuie sur la touche F1 à tout moment après cette introduction !
en: :[name=SirMalo]:To change your controls, press the F1 button at any point after this introduction!
es: :[name=SirMalo]:To change your controls, press the F1 button at any point after this introduction!
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:To change your controls, press the F1 button at any point after this introduction!
de: :[name=SirMalo]:To change your controls, press the F1 button at any point after this introduction!

fr: :[name=SirMalo]:Tu pourras alors modifier tes contrôles comme bon te semble.
en: :[name=SirMalo]:You can then modify your controls as you see fit.
es: :[name=SirMalo]:You can then modify your controls as you see fit.
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:You can then modify your controls as you see fit.
de: :[name=SirMalo]:You can then modify your controls as you see fit.

en: :[name=SirMalo]:Let's move on to the next question.
es: :[name=SirMalo]:Let's move on to the next question.
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:Let's move on to the next question.
de: :[name=SirMalo]:Let's move on to the next question.

fr: :[name=SirMalo]:Quelle est l'apparence qui te définit le mieux ?
en: :[name=SirMalo]:Which appearence defines you the best?
es: :[name=SirMalo]:Which appearence defines you the best?
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:Which appearence defines you the best?
de: :[name=SirMalo]:Which appearence defines you the best?

en: Left
es: Left
pt: Left
de: Left

en: Right
es: Right
pt: Right
de: Right

en: :[name=SirMalo]:Finally, what is your name?
es: :[name=SirMalo]:Finally, what is your name?
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:Finally, what is your name?
de: :[name=SirMalo]:Finally, what is your name?

fr: :[name=SirMalo]:\n[1] ? C'est un très beau nom !\nlJe l'ai bien écrit ?
en: :[name=SirMalo]:\n[1]? It's a great name!\nlDid I write it properly?
es: :[name=SirMalo]:\n[1]? It's a great name!\nlDid I write it properly?
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:\n[1]? It's a great name!\nlDid I write it properly?
de: :[name=SirMalo]:\n[1]? It's a great name!\nlDid I write it properly?

en: :[name=SirMalo]:We're done, young Maker!
es: :[name=SirMalo]:We're done, young Maker!
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:We're done, young Maker!
de: :[name=SirMalo]:We're done, young Maker!

fr: :[name=SirMalo]:Tu vas pouvoir expérimenter cette démo et découvrir les fonctionnalités de PokémonSDK !
en: :[name=SirMalo]:You can now experiment with this demo and discover the features of PokémonSDK!
es: :[name=SirMalo]:You can now experiment with this demo and discover the features of PokémonSDK!
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:You can now experiment with this demo and discover the features of PokémonSDK!
de: :[name=SirMalo]:You can now experiment with this demo and discover the features of PokémonSDK!

en: :[name=SirMalo]:Have fun!
es: :[name=SirMalo]:Have fun!
pt: :[name=SirMalo]:Have fun!
de: :[name=SirMalo]:Have fun!
